task.title: Aligned Word Filter
task.shortdesc: You may also limit the results based on an expression defining an aligned word in another tier.

taskbody.context: From the Aligned Word section of the Word Filter:

step.cmd: Enter the name of the filter tier in the Tier name field.
Choose an Expression Type using the context menu.
Enter the expression you would like to filter with in the Expression field.
Choose whether or not your query should be Case sensitive and/or an Exact match using the check boxes.

stepresult.note: Case sensitive is not applicable to Phonex, Stress pattern, or CGV pattern expressions.
